overview: Codey is lucky to find 3 Oktoberfest hotties who want to do more than drink with him. They lead him away from the crowd, flashing their tits and letting him admire their asses. The 4some head to a hotel room for a good time. Ember has a Xmas surprise for her boyfriend! She's purchased a Riley Reid doll, the sexiest present a guy could want. But this couple gets a Xmas miracle when this sexy doll comes to life and delivers nothing but pleasure!
tagline: Some situations are worth the guilt.
title: Guilty Pleasures
